thread.title: Rail operators under fire for allowing service to "disintegrate" during heatwave
thread.title_full: Rail operators under fire for allowing service to "disintegrate" during heatwave

author: Gregory Walton
title: Rail operators under fire for allowing service to "disintegrate" during heatwave
text: Rail operators under fire for allowing service to "disintegrate" during heatwave Ministers attack rail operators for failing to maintain proper service during the heatwave Britain's trains came to a slow run when Network Rail announced that trains would have to run slower to ensure rails didnt buckle Photo: Rex
